thread.title: Phillip Partain Joins Arvest as Saline County Market President
thread.title_full: Phillip Partain Joins Arvest as Saline County Market President

title: Phillip Partain Joins Arvest as Saline County Market President
text:
by Gwen Moritz on Friday, Sep. 18, 2015 1:34 pm Phillip Partain 
Arvest Bank announced Friday that it has hired Phillip Partain, formerly of Simmons First National Bank, as president of its Saline County market. 
A Benton native and 20-year bank industry veteran, Partain previously held the position of vice president of commercial lending for Simmons. Arvest has two branches in Saline County, one on Military Road in Benton and one on North Reynolds Road in Bryant. 
"Weâ€™re thrilled to have Phillip on our team in the Saline County market," John Womack, president and CEO of Arvest in central Arkansas, said in a news release. "After working in this industry for 20 years, he has invaluable experience and perspective. He is already invested in that community and will lead the team in providing the right financial products and excellent customer service."Partain is a member of the Central Arkansas Risk Management Association.
